snippet: LANDESMAN--Ross, died March 31, Boca Raton FL. WWII Army Air Corps vet, 50-year career in building maintenance in Manhattan. Husband of Shirley for 67 years, brother of Doris Wolf (deceased), father of Joanne and Roy (Anne), grandfather of Matthew and Jacob Fiorino and Gwen Landesman. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LANDESMAN--Ross, died March 31, Boca Raton FL. WWII Army Air Corps vet, 50-year career in building maintenance in Manhattan. Husband of Shirley for 67 years, brother of Doris Wolf (deceased), father of Joanne and Roy (Anne), grandfather of Matthew and Jacob Fiorino and Gwen Landesman. 1/3
